data.description: A simple, unified interface for markup langs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There are many interfaces for markup languages such as Textile,
    Markdown and BBCode on CPAN, but all of them are implemented in
    different ways. This module is just a wrapper for Text::Textile,
    Text::Markdown and HTML::BBCode that provides a unified interface,
    so that the three can be used interchangeably.
